description.zh-cn: 南唐最后一任君主，中国历史上首屈一指的词人，后人誉为“千古词帝”。
description.en: The last ruler of the Southern Tang, a preeminent Ci poet in Chinese history, revered by later generations as the 'Emperor of Ci Poetry'.

description.zh-cn: 南唐第二位君主，李煜之父。
description.en: The second ruler of the Southern Tang, father of Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 南唐元宗李璟长子，李煜长兄。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Yuanzong Li Jing of Southern Tang, and the elder brother of Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 南唐皇室成员，李璟之弟，被李弘冀毒杀。
description.en: A member of the Southern Tang imperial family, younger brother of Li Jing, poisoned by Li Hongji.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一，由李昪在江南建立的政权。
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, a state established in Jiangnan by Li Bian.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继五代十国之后的大一统中原王朝。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 南唐官员，因反对李煜被立为太子而被李璟贬谪。
description.en: An official of the Southern Tang who was demoted and exiled by Li Jing for opposing Li Yu's appointment as crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 南唐皇室成员，李璟之子，李煜之弟。
description.en: A member of the Southern Tang imperial family, son of Li Jing and younger brother of Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 南唐的都城，今为中国江苏省南京市。
description.en: The capital of the Southern Tang, now modern-day Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一。
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 北宋开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋的都城，今为中国河南省开封市。
description.en: The capital of the Northern Song, now modern-day Kaifeng, Henan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 北宋将领，率军攻克金陵，灭亡南唐。
description.en: A general of the Northern Song dynasty who led the army to conquer Jinling and overthrow the Southern Tang.

en: Conquest of Southern Tang by Song

description.zh-cn: 北宋消灭南唐的统一战争。
description.en: The war of unification in which the Northern Song conquered the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 吴越国最后一位国王。
description.en: The last king of the Wuyue kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第二位皇帝，宋太祖赵匡胤之弟。
description.en: The second emperor of the Northern Song dynasty, younger brother of Emperor Taizu Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 南唐后主李煜的第二任皇后。
description.en: The second empress of Li Yu, the last ruler of the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 南唐及北宋官员、文学家。
description.en: An official and scholar who served in both the Southern Tang and Northern Song dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 南唐官员，被李煜错杀。
description.en: An official of the Southern Tang who was wrongfully executed by Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 南唐官员，被李煜错杀。
description.en: An official of the Southern Tang who was wrongfully executed by Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省洛阳市下辖的市辖区，李煜的陵墓所在地。
description.en: A district of Luoyang City, Henan Province, China, where Li Yu's tomb is located.

description.zh-cn: 南唐后主李煜的第一任皇后。
description.en: The first empress of Li Yu, the last ruler of the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 南唐后主李煜之子。
description.en: Son of Li Yu, the last ruler of the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 南唐后主李煜之子。
description.en: Son of Li Yu, the last ruler of the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 李煜是南唐元宗李璟的第六子。
description.en: Li Yu was the sixth son of Emperor Yuanzong Li Jing of Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 李弘冀是李煜的长兄。
description.en: Li Hongji was Li Yu's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 李弘冀为人猜忌严刻，导致李煜感到惶恐，不敢参与政事。
description.en: Li Hongji was suspicious and harsh, which made Li Yu fearful and reluctant to get involved in political affairs.

description.zh-cn: 959年，李弘冀毒杀了叔父李景遂。
description.en: In 959, Li Hongji poisoned his uncle, Li Jingsui.

description.zh-cn: 大周后是李煜的第一任皇后。
description.en: Da Zhou Hou was the first empress of Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 小周后是李煜的第二任皇后。
description.en: Xiao Zhou Hou was the second empress of Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 李仲寓是李煜的儿子。
description.en: Li Zhongyu was the son of Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 李仲宣是李煜的儿子。
description.en: Li Zhongxuan was the son of Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 李煜于961年即位为南唐国主，971年去“唐”国号，改称江南国主，直至975年亡国。
description.en: Li Yu ascended the throne as the ruler of Southern Tang in 961, renounced the 'Tang' title in 971 to be called the Ruler of Jiangnan, and ruled until the state's fall in 975.

description.zh-cn: 钟谟认为李煜“德轻志懦”，不适合成为君主，反对立其为太子。
description.en: Zhong Mo believed Li Yu was 'of light virtue and weak will' and thus unsuitable to be a ruler, opposing his appointment as crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 因钟谟反对立李煜为太子，李璟大怒，将其贬官并流放。
description.en: Because Zhong Mo opposed making Li Yu the crown prince, Li Jing became furious, demoted him, and sent him into exile.

description.zh-cn: 971年，北宋军队消灭了南汉政权。
description.en: In 971, the Northern Song army conquered the Southern Han state.

description.zh-cn: 宋灭南唐之战导致了南唐的灭亡。
description.en: The Conquest of Southern Tang by Song led to the fall of the Southern Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 因李煜托病不至汴京，宋太祖赵匡胤于974年派兵攻打南唐。
description.en: Because Li Yu feigned illness and refused to go to Bianjing, Emperor Taizu Zhao Kuangyin dispatched troops to attack Southern Tang in 974.

description.zh-cn: 曹彬是宋太祖赵匡胤麾下的将领。
description.en: Cao Bin was a general under the command of Emperor Taizu Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 在宋灭南唐之战中，吴越王钱俶奉宋太祖之命出兵协助宋军。
description.en: During the Conquest of Southern Tang by Song, King Qian Chu of Wuyue was ordered by Emperor Taizu of Song to dispatch troops to assist the Song army.

description.zh-cn: 李煜曾写信劝说钱俶合作对抗宋朝，但钱俶拒绝并将信交给了宋朝。
description.en: Li Yu wrote a letter to persuade Qian Chu to cooperate against the Song dynasty, but Qian Chu refused and handed the letter over to the Song court.

description.zh-cn: 李煜晚年对自己当初错杀大臣潘佑感到悔恨不已。
description.en: In his later years, Li Yu deeply regretted his wrongful execution of the minister Pan You.

description.zh-cn: 李煜晚年对自己当初错杀大臣李平感到悔恨不已。
description.en: In his later years, Li Yu deeply regretted his wrongful execution of the minister Li Ping.

description.zh-cn: 一种说法是，宋太宗赵光义因李煜词中流露的故国之思而不能容忍，用牵机药将其毒杀。
description.en: According to one account, Emperor Taizong Zhao Guangyi could not tolerate the nostalgia for his former kingdom expressed in Li Yu's poetry and had him poisoned with 'qianji' poison.

description.zh-cn: 据传，在李煜被俘后，宋太宗赵光义多次强迫小周后侍寝。
description.en: It is rumored that after Li Yu was captured, Emperor Taizong Zhao Guangyi repeatedly forced Xiao Zhou Hou to serve him in bed.

description.zh-cn: 徐铉在北宋任职，曾奉宋太宗之命探望李煜。
description.en: Xu Xuan served in the Northern Song court and was ordered by Emperor Taizong to visit Li Yu.

description.zh-cn: 978年，徐铉奉宋太宗之命探视李煜，李煜向其表达了错杀大臣的悔恨。
description.en: In 978, Xu Xuan visited Li Yu under the order of Emperor Taizong, during which Li Yu expressed his regret for wrongfully executing his ministers.

description.zh-cn: 李煜死后被葬于洛阳北邙山，该地位于今孟津区。
description.en: After his death, Li Yu was buried at Mount Mang in Luoyang, which is located in modern-day Mengjin District.
